api_method.title: Select API method
api_method.description:
To be able to query the API an `auth_token` is required which can be obtained by following [these](https://plaato.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/360003234717-Auth-token) instructions

 Selected device: **{device_type}** 

If you rather use the built in webhook method (Airlock only) please check the box below and leave Auth Token blank

webhook.title: Webhook to use
webhook.description:
To send events to Home Assistant, you will need to set up the webhook feature in Plaato Airlock.

Fill in the following info:

- URL: `{webhook_url}`
- Method: POST

See [the documentation]({docs_url}) for further details.

error.invalid_webhook_device: You have selected a device that does not support sending data to a webhook. It is only available for the Airlock
error.no_auth_token: You need to add an auth token
error.no_api_method: You need to add an auth token or select webhook
